docs.snippet: Two American Olympic swimmers were taken off their flight from Brazil to the U.S. by local authorities amid an investigation into a reported robbery targeting 12-time medalist Ryan Lochte and his teammates....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two American Olympic swimmers were taken off their flight from Brazil to the U.S. by local authorities amid an investigation into a reported robbery targeting 12-time medalist Ryan Lochte and his teammates.

headline.main: 2 Lochte Teammates in Robbery Probe Pulled Off Plane
headline.print_headline: 2 Lochte Teammates in Robbery Probe Pulled Off Plane

docs.snippet: Kathy Smith, who transformed herself into a successful aerobics entrepreneur, instilled the value of competition in Kate Grace, the top U.S. entrant in the 800....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kathy Smith, who transformed herself into a successful aerobics entrepreneur, instilled the value of competition in Kate Grace, the top U.S. entrant in the 800.

headline.main: Inspiring Her Daughter, an Olympic Runner, Was No Sweat for a Fitness Guru

docs.snippet: Ryan Lochte was accused of fabricating his account of the episode, in which he said armed men had held up him and three teammates. A police chief said they had vandalized a gas station....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ryan Lochte was accused of fabricating his account of the episode, in which he said armed men had held up him and three teammates. A police chief said they had vandalized a gas station.
docs.abstract: Unraveling of American Olympic swimmer Ryan Lochte's version of encounter between group of athletes and Brazilian authorities, which he originally described as armed robbery, strains relations between two countries; incident reflects ongoing concerns in country where privileged are seen as shielded from violent crime that plagues ordinary citizens.

headline.main: U.S. Swimmers’ Disputed Robbery Claim Fuels Tension in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Accused of Fabricating Robbery, Swimmers Fuel Tension in Brazil

byline.contributor: Vinod Sreeharsha, Mariana Simões and Paula Moura contributed reporting.
